metadata.description:
Protecting the world from the strange is what Verity, Michael, and
Sandoval do best, and on the island nation of Hidalgo, things have been
getting very strange indeed. The president has declared martial law,
sending everyone to excavations in the jungle. But the strangest thing of
all is the involvement of the mysterious organization O.C.C.U.L.T. What
could they want with an island with no strategic value? It's up to the
Strangers to find out!
metadata.name: The Mysterious Strangers
